PHRASE.LANG: What were you wearing when you found out that Darth Vader was Luke's father? Well, this is what Luke was wearing during that epic moment that stunned Star Wars™ fans the world over.[#Legal]

Que portiez-vous lorsque vous avez découvert que Dark Vador était le père de Luke ? Eh bien, cette tenue est celle que Luke portait pendant ce moment épique qui a stupéfié les fans de Star Wars™ du monde entier.[#Legal]

Was würdest du wohl an Luke Skywalkers Stelle anziehen, wenn dir klar wird, dass Darth Vader dein Vater ist? Jedenfalls trug Luke das hier in diesem großen Augenblick, der die Star Wars™-Fans weltweit in seinen Bann zog.[#Legal]
Com'eri vestito quando hai scoperto che Darth Vader era il padre di Luke? Beh, questo è quello che indossava Luke in quel momento epico che fulminò i fan di Star Wars™ in tutto il mondo.[#Legal]

¿Qué llevabas puesto cuando te enteraste de que Darth Vader era el padre de Luke? Bien, esto era lo que Luke llevaba puesto durante ese momento épico que dejó alucinados a los fans de La Guerra de las galaxias™ de todo el mundo.[#Legal]
What were you wearing when you found out that Darth Vader was Luke's father? Well, this is what Luke was wearing during that epic moment that stunned Star Wars™ fans the world over.[#Legal]
